**Please complete this checklist before submitting a code issue:**
- [ ] Clear your environment, rerun the code, verify that the problem was reproduced
- [ ] Restart R, rerun the code, verify that the problem was reproduced 
- [ ] Trace the issue back through the code to determine causality
- [ ] Document in the code with a note where the problem is occurring 
- [ ] Describe the issue below clearly and succinctly 
- [ ] Double check this checklist and submit issue 
- [ ] Save changes and push code to GitHub
- [ ] Create a PR with relevant reviewer and tag this issue in comment  (see issue #)
